title: Astroboy font
content:
Somebody know the font used for this design of astroboy  
 [http://sost.emulationzone.org/astroboy/astroboy.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20110810000019/http:/sost.emulationzone.org/astroboy/astroboy.gif "http://sost.emulationzone.org/astroboy/astroboy.gif")

or if there are some font seems to the used for astroboy

Thank you

hernandomiguel
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
[http://sost.emulationzone.org/astroboy/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20110810000019/http:/sost.emulationzone.org/astroboy/index.htm "http://sost.emulationzone.org/astroboy/index.htm")

Looks custom to me, although it resembles [Crillee](http://web.archive.org/web/20110810000019/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/crillee-italic/).
